official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to gasoline price increases which have occurred after the Exxon Valdez oil spill of March 24, 1989.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that gasoline prices should be rolled back to levels existing prior to the Exxon Valdez oil spill of March 24, 1989.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to gasoline price increases which have occurred after the Exxon Valdez oil spill of March 24, 1989.
